titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3004) to amend section 276 of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to reentry of removed aliens, and providing for proceedings during the period from July 3, 2017, through July 10, 2017.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3004) to amend section 276 of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to reentry of removed aliens, and providing for proceedings during the period from July 3, 2017, through July 10, 2017.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-196, by Mr. Sessions.
Providing for adjournment for the period of July 3, 2017 through July 10, 2017.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 61.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 415.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 190 (Roll no. 339).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 191 (Roll no. 340).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3004) to amend section 276 of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to reentry of removed aliens, and providing for proceedings during the period from July 3, 2017, through July 10, 2017.
